post.body: Well, zeronet has changed quite a bit since I was last here.
I picked up a bunch of old transistors. Not sure what I'm going to do with them!
What's everyone think of Mikrotik equipment? I like it, but the wireless stuff hates certain products.

There's a commercial bakery near where I work. They make things like sandwich buns and singe-serve fruit pies. You can always tell what they are baking, and I'd love to go over there and purchase some pies hot off the line, they probably taste a lot better than the ones that sit around for a while...

comment.body: @Sick: It's the griffin from Sprecher Root Beer.
